org.openstreetmap.osm.data.osmbin
Interface IIDIndexFile

All Known Implementing Classes:
IDIndexFile
public interface IIDIndexFile

(c) 2008 by here
It stores an index on the nodeID of nodes and maps them to record-numbers in nodes.obm.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
See Also:
IGeoIndexFile, Node

Method Summary
 void close()
          Release all ressources.
 long get(long id)
          Look up a record-number in this index.
 void put(long id, long recordNr)
          Add the given entity-ID to record-number -mapping to this index.
 void remove(long id)
          Remove the given entity from this index.
 

Method Detail

put

void put(long id,
         long recordNr)
         throws java.io.IOException
Add the given entity-ID to record-number -mapping to this index.

Parameters:
id - the ID of the entity
recordNr - the record-number where the entity with this ID is stored
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if we cannot grow the file

remove

void remove(long id)
            throws java.io.IOException
Remove the given entity from this index.

Parameters:
id - the ID of the entity
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if we cannot write or seek in the file.

get

long get(long id)
         throws java.io.IOException
Look up a record-number in this index.

Parameters:
id - the ID of the entity
Returns:
the record-number where the entity with this ID is stored or -1
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if we cannot read from the file

           throws java.io.IOException
Release all ressources.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if we cannot write
